content: YT", "status": "NEW" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getAircraftGroundDuties ``` # Aircraft Minimum Equipment List Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/aircraft/aircraftMel/{regId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "regId": "TCSOG", "aircraftMels": [ { "extraInfo": "Mel Item Info", "workOrderId": "22222222", "status": "NEW", "issueDate": "2024-04-04T11:13:00Z", "clearedDate": "2024-05-04T11:25:00Z", "limitFlightHour": 120, "limitLandingCycle": 5, "limitDay": 1, "ataReference": "25-00-17-01A", "description": "25-17-01A : MEL A : Required", "cdl": "N" "melCategory": "C", "engineerId": "ME006243", "restriction": "Text-Value-Type-Description" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getAircraftMels ``` # Aircraft Weight & Balance Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/flight/aircraft/aircraftWeightBalance/{regId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "regId": "TCSOG", "aircraftWeightBalances": [ { "extraInfo": "Weight & Balance Info", "recordWorkOrderId": "22222222", "recordDate": "2024-04-04", "recordType": "A", "registerarId ": "IM111111", "description": "EOD: EOD-B111-11-1111-R11 / REV.:11 PERFORMED", "documentNumber": "EOD: EOD-B111-11-1111-R11", "type": "Basic Data", "weight": 11111.111111111, "unitOfWeight": "KG", "centerOfGravity": 11111.111111111, "unitOfCenterOfGravity": "MM", "moment": 11111.111111111, "index": 11111.111111111, "meanAerodynamicChord": 11111.111111111, "lateralCenterOfGravity": 11111.111111111, "unitOfLateralCenterOfGravity": "MM", "lateralMoment": 11111.111111111, "lateralIndex": 11111.111111111 } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getAircraftWeightBalances ```
